intent_atoms.description: Implement session persistence so the app restores open documents, annotations, and layouts on relaunch.
Session persistence must restore all open documents, annotations, and layout configurations when the application is relaunched.
The system must always maintain a consistent state of open documents, annotations, and layout settings across sessions.
Use session persistence (Task E3) to manage restoration logic, as documented in DOCS/INPROGRESS/E3_Session_Persistence.md.
